Room.Name: Crystal Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered a magnificant crystal room connecting the jacinith hall extending to the east and west, and the ruby hallway extending to the south.
Room.LongDescription: The room reflects a lot of light, making it hard to tell which direction you are actually heading. Far to the south, you can make out another crystal room and a stairway. Looking to the east, you can see yourself in the distance standing in a crystal hallway. Is it an illusion or isn't it?
